name: eventsphere-backend
description: A powerful backend for event management software. Handles registrations, scheduling, ticketing, and more with a scalable API. Built for seamless integration and efficiency

scripts.pretest: node -e "if (process.version.slice(1).split('.')[0] < 18) { console.error('Unsupported Node.js version, please use version 18'); process.exit(1); }"

author: Airtribe
